item.title: Boundary loss for highly unbalanced segmentation

item.title: SegNet: A Deep Convolutional Encoder-Decoder Architecture for Image Segmentation
item.description: FCN：Fully Convolutional Networks for Semantic Segmentation https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.4038 U-Net：U-Net: Convolutional Networks for Biomedical Image Segmentation https://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04597 SegNet：SegNet: A Deep Convolutional Encoder-Decoder Architecture for Image Segmentation https://arxiv.org/pdf/1511.00561.pdf 概览 论文所要解决的问题： encoder
